name: Red Deer
description: The red deer is one of the largest deer species. A male red deer is called a stag, while a female is a hind. Red deer are known for their impressive antlers.

name: Roosevelt Elk
description: The Roosevelt elk is the largest of the four surviving subspecies of elk in North America. Bulls can weigh over 450 kg and possess magnificent antlers.

name: Brown Bear
description: The brown bear is one of the most dangerous animals to hunt. Extremely powerful and potentially aggressive, it requires careful planning and powerful weapons.

name: Wild Boar
description: Wild boar are tough and aggressive animals. They can be found in various habitats and are known for their unpredictable behavior when wounded.

name: European Hare
description: The European hare is a fast and agile small game animal. They are most active during dawn and dusk, making them challenging targets.

name: Coyote
description: Coyotes are intelligent and adaptable predators. They are known for their distinctive howl and cunning hunting behavior.
